name: @fuji-calendar/types
description: Shared type definitions for Fuji Calendar

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && find dist -name '*.ts' -exec sh -c 'mv "$1" "${1%.ts}.d.ts"' _ {} \; && echo 'const FUJI_COORDINATES = { latitude: 35.3628, longitude: 138.730781, elevation: 3776 }; const JST_TIMEZONE = "Asia/Tokyo"; const JST_OFFSET = 9; const ErrorType = { VALIDATION_ERROR: "VALIDATION_ERROR", AUTHENTICATION_ERROR: "AUTHENTICATION_ERROR", AUTHORIZATION_ERROR: "AUTHORIZATION_ERROR", DATABASE_ERROR: "DATABASE_ERROR", CALCULATION_ERROR: "CALCULATION_ERROR", EXTERNAL_API_ERROR: "EXTERNAL_API_ERROR", RATE_LIMIT_ERROR: "RATE_LIMIT_ERROR" }; module.exports = { FUJI_COORDINATES, JST_TIMEZONE, JST_OFFSET, ErrorType };' > dist/index.js
